thread.title: Snapchat value drops $1bln on Rihanna rebuke

title: Snapchat value drops $1bln on Rihanna rebuke
text:
Snapchat value drops $1bln on Rihanna rebuke 1:57am IST - 01:36 
Pop singer Rihanna urged her fans to stop using Snapchat after the messaging app ran an ad making light of her abuse, wiping out $1 billion in stock market value. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Pop singer Rihanna urged her fans to stop using Snapchat after the messaging app ran an ad making light of her abuse, wiping out $1 billion in stock market value. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2phAsB0
